word: THERE IS CONSIDERABLE MATERIAL ON TEMPERANCE IN THIS SELECTION. NOTE, FOR INSTANCE: “WE ARE TO PRACTICE TEMPERANCE ON EVERY POINT [WHY?]; FOR WE NEED ALL THE BRAIN NERVE-POWER THAT IT IS POSSIBLE FOR US TO HAVE IN ORDER THAT WE MAY BE ABLE TO RESIST SATAN'S TEMPTATIONS.” IT IS TYPICAL OF ELLEN WHITE TO MAKE A POSITIVE CASE FOR CHRISTIAN STANDARDS AND VIRTUES. HERE WE SEE HER ENTHUSIASM, REGARDING KEEN MINDS AND REFINED REASONING ABILITIES, OFFERED IN SUPPORT OF BEING TEMPERATE.
